content: Adela, introduced herself to Kaiser Heinrich as his half-sister and a Princess of the Holy Roman Empire. She describes herself as curious, ambitious, rebellious and adventurous. When Heinrich asked about being sadistic, Adela admits that she enjoys inflicting pain and suffering on others, finding it a thrill to see people squirm under her questions and orders. However, she reassures Heinrich that she would never harm him or other family members intentionally, unless provoked.
